Really really quick postgres install on ubuntu 16.04http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/really-quick-postgres-install-on-ubuntu/Fri, 02 Mar 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/really-quick-postgres-install-on-ubuntu/sudo apt-get install postgresql postgresql-contrib sudo -u postgres psql ALTER USER postgres PASSWORD '123456'; \q
